txt.en: You have been tasked with protecting the Khâlbina from threats on her route to Jax Phanâl. You were below deck for a moment when you heard shouting from above. You've been boarded by Corsairs!
Defeat Captain Belizâm the Bitter at the ship's helm
Find and defeat Captain Belizâm the Bitter.
Captain Belizâm the Bitter approaches, ready to duel!

'Wow! What good fortune for the crew that you were on board to repel those Corsairs! I've been instructed to bring you back to Umbar Baharbêl via Jax Phanâl, there on the coast. There are other pressing matters for which you are needed.'
You have been tasked with protecting the Khâlbina from threats on her route to Halrax. You were below deck for a moment when you heard shouting from above. You've been boarded by Corsairs!
'They got me good. Give them a thrashing for me.'
'That's got me right again. Thanks, I needed that.'
'They were on us so fast. Show them we can give as good as we get.'
'I'll be all right. Just give me a moment to collect myself.'
